resources.string: Notifications for the WorkMule practice application.

The Request button fires time consuming tasks that take seconds to complete. If you click again before the tasks are finished, the requests will be enqueued and process one after the other. 

 The ViewModel presents progress notifications.

If you NAVIGATE AWAY from the fragment, tasks should still be processed.
This practice app is an example of Notifications, ViewModel - LiveData and the WorkManager.
